SERVICE.DATA_SELECTION:
EYP->(RecLock("EYP",.F.))
-->>VERIFIAR(Retirar de document_sequence_number)
EEC 1 xFilial("EEC")+#TAG EYP_PREEMB#
EEC->(RecLock("EEC",.F.))
#TAGEX bl_cross_reference\control:document_status#
#TAGEX bl_cross_reference\control:document_sequence_number#
#TAGEX bl_cross_reference\control:pdf_file_name#
#TAGEX bl_cross_reference\control:hyperlink_address#
MSMM(EYP->EYP_CODCOM,,,,2)
MSMM(,AVSX3("EYP_VM_COM",3),,#TAGEX bl_cross_reference\comments#,1,,,"EYP","EYP_CODCOM")
#TAGEX bl_cross_reference\document:document_number# #TAG EYP_BLNUM#
StoD(Left(#TAGEX bl_cross_reference\document:create_date_time#,8)) #TAG EYP_DATA#
#TAGEX bl_cross_reference\document:document_type#
EEC->(MsUnlock()) EYP->(MsUnlock())
